meta.title: LyDian Advisor Hub: AI Advisory Center | AI Business Consulting Platform
meta.description: LyDian Advisor Hub provides AI-powered solutions for business consulting, cultural advisory, decision support, and learning paths. 8 expert advisor modules.
meta.keywords: ai business advisor, consulting assistant, ai decision support, cultural advisor ai, learning path ai, startup accelerator ai, life coach ai, meeting insights ai

hero.title: Expert AI Advisors for Every Need
hero.subtitle: From business strategy to personal development, cultural consulting to startup acceleration - AI-powered professional consulting in 8 different areas

cultural.title: Cultural Advisor
cultural.description: Cross-cultural communication, local customs, business protocol consulting. Expert recommendations on 150+ country cultures

decision.title: Decision Support Matrix
decision.description: Data-driven decision making, risk analysis, scenario planning. Multi-criteria decision analysis and optimization

knowledge.title: Knowledge Assistant
knowledge.description: Rapid research, knowledge synthesis, fact-checking. Academic and professional knowledge discovery

learning.title: Learning Path Planner
learning.description: Personalized training programs, skill development roadmaps, learning tracking

life_coach.title: Life Coach
life_coach.description: Personal goal setting, habit formation, motivation coaching. Work-life balance consulting

meeting.title: Meeting Insights
meeting.description: Meeting analysis, action item extraction, decision tracking. Productivity improvement recommendations

startup.title: Startup Accelerator
startup.description: Business model validation, pitch deck consulting, investor finding strategies. Go-to-market planning

health.title: Health Orchestrator
health.description: Wellness tracking, health information resources, exercise and nutrition recommendations (not medical advice)

step1.title: Choose Advisor
step1.description: Select the one that suits your needs from 8 expert advisors

step2.title: Ask Your Question
step2.description: Ask detailed questions or share scenarios with your advisor

step3.title: Get Expert Recommendations
step3.description: LyDian AI provides comprehensive analysis and recommendations based on expertise

specialized.title: 8 Expert Modules
specialized.description: 8 different AI advisor modules, each specialized in their own field

contextual.title: Contextual Analysis
contextual.description: Each advisor analyzes your problem in all dimensions and offers context-appropriate solutions

actionable.title: Actionable Recommendations
actionable.description: Not theoretical knowledge, but implementable step-by-step action plans

multi_domain.title: Multi-Domain Expertise
multi_domain.description: Consulting in business, personal development, culture, health and more

data_driven.title: Data-Driven
data_driven.description: Data analysis and visualization tools to support your decisions

personalized.title: Personalized
personalized.description: Consulting tailored to your industry, experience and goals

continuous.title: Continuous Support
continuous.description: By your side throughout the process from initial consultation to implementation

collaborative.title: Team Collaboration
collaborative.description: Share consulting sessions with your team and work together

user1.name: John Smith
user1.comment: With Startup Accelerator, our seed funding timeline went from 6 months to 2 months. The pitch deck consulting was excellent.

user2.name: Sarah Johnson
user2.comment: Cultural Advisor has been a game-changer in our international team management. Being able to get detailed information about each country's business culture is amazing.

user3.name: Mike Chen
user3.comment: With Meeting Insights, our meetings are 40% more efficient. Automatic action item extraction saves time.

q1.question: What languages does each advisor support?
q1.answer: All 8 advisor modules serve in 40+ languages including English, Spanish, German, Arabic, Russian, and Chinese. Cultural Advisor responds understanding the cultural nuances of each language.

q2.question: Are my consulting sessions confidential?
q2.answer: Yes. All your consulting sessions are protected with end-to-end encryption. Your data is not used for model training and is not shared with third parties.

q3.question: Can I use multiple advisors simultaneously?
q3.answer: In Pro and Enterprise plans, you can access all 8 advisors simultaneously. For example, you can use both Decision Support Matrix and Startup Accelerator for a business decision.

q4.question: Will Startup Accelerator really help me find funding?
q4.answer: Startup Accelerator guides you in pitch deck preparation, investor targeting, financial projection creation, and go-to-market strategy. It accelerates your fundraising process but does not guarantee it.

q5.question: How does team collaboration work?
q5.answer: You can add 5 team members in Pro plan, unlimited in Enterprise plan. You can share consulting sessions, comment, and create action plans together.
